item.title: A Universe in a Box
item.description: Universe on Screen The screen you’re currently looking at is a universe. A little universe with its own space and time. In this article we’ll be exploring what makes a screen tick and creating our own display controller with an FPGA. If you’re new here take a look at What is Project F? Space & Time The smallest area we can control on a screen is the pixel (picture element): this is our quantum of space.
